Application_Code.title: Application_Code
Application_Code.description: Format: 5 digit number, found on the Application record Application_Code__c field This is the unique identifier of the Application record

CandidateSpecificQuestions.title: CandidateSpecificQuestions
CandidateSpecificQuestions.description: These are the Questions asked by you from the Job Spec Record from the Candidate Specific Questions field and answers by the Candidate for these questions specifically and the answers should be populated on the Candidate__c record on the following fields: The Career Goals to be populated on the Career Goals field Cost to Company on the Cost to Company field Cost To Company Breakdown on the Cost To Company Breakdown field Reason for leaving current role on the Reason for leaving current role field

Criminal.title: Criminal
Criminal.description:
This is from the Criminal Input
The user needs to specify whether they have a criminal record or not, if yes then they need to give an explanation
Format: Text
To populate the Criminal_record__c field on the Applicant record

Email.title: Email
Email.description: Format: Email This is the Email Address the Candidate typed when they started their chat. This is the unique identifier if the Candidate record

FamInPWC.title: FamInPWC
FamInPWC.description:
This is from the FamInPWC input
The User needs to specify whether they have family in the company
Field to update on Application: Family_in_PWC__c
Format: Text

FirstPrefOffice.title: FirstPrefOffice
FirstPrefOffice.description:
This is from the FirstPrefOffice input
The User will indicate which office they prefer 
Format: Text
Field to update on Application: Preferred_Office__c

NonNegotiables.title: NonNegotiables
NonNegotiables.description: The Non Negotiables on the Job_Spec record from the Non_Negotiables__c field. If any of these are not met just simply input yes or no on the Application record's Non_Negotiables__c field

QuestionsAndAnswers.title: QuestionsAndAnswers
QuestionsAndAnswers.description: These are the Questions asked by you from the Job Spec Record from the Questions to ask field and answers by the Candidate for these questions specifically

SAICA.title: SAICA
SAICA.description:
From the SAICA Input
The User needs to indicate if they have ever been a member of the CAICA
Format: Text
To populate the Been_in_a_SAICA_Contract__c field on the Candidate record

SecondPrefOffice.title: SecondPrefOffice
SecondPrefOffice.description:
From the SecondPrefOffice Input
The User will indicate which office they prefer second
Format: Text
To populate the Second_preferred_office__c on the Applicant record
